long_description: During those long trips when no amount of fidgeting can make you comfortable, the Paddlers Supply Company SKWOOSH paddling cushion offers pressure relief in all the right places. Lightweight gel works in combination with a thin layer of cross-linked foam to deliver comfort, warmth and relief from pressure. Pad is shaped to fit most kayak seats; nonskid bottom stays put in the cockpit. Low-friction, highly durable waterproof cover makes cushion easy to get in and out of your watercraft. Cushion floats to ease retrieval in case you capsize. Hang loop eases storage and drying.
short_description: During those long trips when no amount of fidgeting can make you comfortable, the Paddlers Supply Company SKWOOSH paddling cushion offers pressure relief in all the right places.
